channel.title: Prayer [317]
channel.description:
how do i change the level for prayers and how do i edit the text in the prayers like
level 16 improved reflexes increases your attack by 10% how do i edit this?
and change the level for certain prayers?

item.title: Prayer [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

1.) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443983.msg3260058.html#msg3260058
2.) ClickingMost, find the id for the button, than change the level requirements.
Example

case 21247: // Protect From Melee if (c.playerLevel[5] == 0) { c.setClientConfig(97, 0); c.ProtMelee = false; c.checkHead(); c.prayOn = false; c.sM("You need to recharge your Prayer at an altar."); } if (c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) < [b]43[/b]) { c.setClientConfig(97, 0); c.sendFrame126("You need a @blu@Prayer level of [b]43[/b] to use Protect from Melee.", 357); c.sendFrame164(356); c.sM("You need a Prayer level of [b]43[/b] to use this."); } if (c.ProtMelee == false && c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) > [b]42[/b] && c.playerLevel[5] > 0) { c.headIcon = 1; c.ProtMelee = true; c.ProtMage = false; c.ProtRange = false; c.Retribution = false; c.Redemption = false; c.Smite = false; c.praydrain = 4; c.setClientConfig(95, 0); c.setClientConfig(96, 0); c.setClientConfig(98, 0); c.setClientConfig(99, 0); c.setClientConfig(100, 0); c.prayOn = true; c.getHead(); } else if (c.ProtMelee == true && c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) > [b]42[/b] && c.playerLevel[5] > 0) { c.setClientConfig(97, 0); c.ProtMelee = false; c.checkHead(); c.praydrain = 0; c.prayOn = false; } break;

42 - Level Required -1
43 - Level Required

Read full topic
